Title: Five Owl Farm
Principal species featured: Barn owl , little owl , long-eared owl , short-eared owl , tawny owl

Title: The Amber Time Machine
Principal species featured: Bee , midge , long-legged fly , thunder gnat , aphid , ant , mite , giant bean tree , balted tree , seaburn tree , nazareno tree , palm , stingless bee , assassin bug , tadpole , marsh beetle , diving beetle , poison dart frog , bromelia , damselfly , bamboo , minuet worm , fig , fig wasp , nematodes , scale insect , theropod dinosaur

Title: Five Big Cats and a Camera
Ice Age Death Trap
Principal species featured: Saber-toothed cat , dire wolf , short-faced bear , Columbian mammoth , American mastodon , giant ground sloths , Camelops , Harlan 's ground sloth , American lion , ancient bison , Hagerman horse , Teratornis
